ovdesc.p: This screen is used to maintain the Bank charges(Inbound Our and Outbound Our) in the payments hub.

desc.p: Indicates whether the charge is to be applied always or not.
Possible Values:
"Y" - Yes
"N" - No
Indicates if only the defined charge is to be applied. Payments hub will not consider other charges
Possible Values:
Y - Yes
N - No
Indicates the unique ID to identify the Bank charges fee type.
Indicates the unique bank charges ID can be linked with multiple records in this table.
Specifies the feetype which is linked to the bank charge defined.
This would be the percentage indicated in
nn.nnnn (upto 9 decimal places). If this is blank
then default percentage as defined in FeeType
table would be applied. If this is zero then no VAT
on charge would be applied even if defined in
FeeType table for the respective Fee Type.

Specifies the order (sequence) of the record in the application. Based on the value, a record is prioritised in such a way that, it is given higher preference for selection under peeling logic applied in the payments hub.
